item.description:
On Wednesdays, Zooma have a Ladies' Night special.

From their web site:

--
Ladies Night
Ladies eat free on Wednesdays!
Unescorted ladies eat from our fabulous Bistro menu for free on Wednesday nights! Choices include wonderful salads, pan seared tuna, beef carpaccio, authentic Neapolitan pizza and more. Come in and see why Wednesday nights at ZOOMA is THE place to be! (some restrictions apply, ask your server for details)

Restaurant Site: http://www.zoomari.ne...
Bistro Menu: http://www.zoomari.ne...
--

The restriction is that you must order an alcoholic drink to go with the bistro item. Also, tax and gratuity are automatically added to your bill and are based on what the cost of the food and drink would be if the food had not been free.

In addition, they do not accept reservations for this special so I am keeping the attendance limit to 8 to ensure we can sit together.

Please message me with any questions you have.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait outside of the restaurant starting at 6:15pm
item.name: Ladies Night @ Zooma
